TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpOperationBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

Docs.summary: Represents an extensibility element added to an within an XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class respresents an extensibility element in Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specific to HTTP. It specifies the relative URL of an operation using as the base the location specified by an <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding>. For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the URL relative to the location specified by the , within the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document, of the operation supported by the .
Docs.value: An unencoded string representing the relative path. The default value is an empty string ("").
